caption:
Ryan Coogler Has Made History... Again 🙌🏾⁠
The acclaimed director of Fruitvale Station, Creed, Black Panther x2, and Sinners is now the FIRST Black director with four films to each gross over $100 million at the box office!⁠
⁠
"Back then, bro, I wasn't making no money. I was $200,000 in debt for film school. It was bad." - Ryan Coogler⁠
⁠
Still, Coogler undertook a major project with Creed. With a modest budget of $35 million, the film opened on Thanksgiving weekend in 2015 and earned $42.6 million in its first five days. 👏🏾⁠
⁠
When Black Panther hit theaters... ⁠
